div.p:
In the court haldin be the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe of the samen the xx dai
of Aprile the yer of god et cetera lxxxvj . Johne of Kintor son and ayr til vmquhile gilbert of
Kyntor grantit and sayd that the tak of his land in the quhilk maistir Androw cadiou
and his spous' inhabitis / he maid to the said maistir androw / and had na dail with his
spous' anent the condicion maid betuix him and the said mastir Androw twiching the assedacion tharof

the samyn dai the said Johne of Kyntor oblist him topay til Johne of Knollis
half a merk of annuel clamit be him of the said land / gif maistir androw cadiow wil
nocht pay him tharof at his hame cuming

Johne of Knollis alexander of marr' Johne Wormot thomas prat gilbert the vaus Dauid
symson androw murref eldar Dauid menyes eldar thomas of marr' Johne the vaus Dauid hil
Sym of crafurd patrik andirson Wil garriach and Wil futhes . chosin and sworne apon
assise / has ordanit anent the paper of compt rekning and payment deliuerit be
Johne malisson til Johne of Kyntor / becaus' it is of viij barellis of sal
mond / that the said Johne malisson sal mak a paper of compt rekning and payment
til Johne of Kintor of four' barellis of salmond allanerly eftir the ordinance of the
assise made tharuppon of before / and deliuer til him again monunday next tocum
And than todecide apon it / quhethir it be sufficent rekning and payment or nocht /

Item it was fundin and decretit be the assise that patrik andirson is dettour til Alexander
chavmer seriand of x s' of vsual money to be pait within lachful tym . And
gif alexander marr' prefis nocht on monunday next tocum that he offerit the x s'
til patrik andirson before the criing downe of the money . he is ordanit to
releve the said patrik of the some' forsaid . this action is continuit in the sam fourm
quhil Wednisdai to the cuming of alexander marr'

the assise / Dauid menyeis eldar forspekar fand and deliuerit / that the payment that
was gevin til Androw branche on the behalf of Duncan nory be Sandris
cowparis wif for certane malt was na sufficent payment / and ordanis that
scho sal pay the said androw for samekil as scho had of the land of malt
within terme of law .

the samen dai in presence of the aldirman Johne fichet and gilbert the vaus becom
souerty til Wilyeam blindsel ane of the ballies for a leid clamit be the
said John' fra Wil litstar' ordanit tobe deliuerit to him / that the said leid
salbe furth' cumand til ony man that has tosay til it sa fer as law
wil et cetera

The xxij dai of aprile the yer' et cetera lxxxvj / Androw telly convict be assis is in amerciament
for the wranguis' strublance of thom lethis wif and takin of hir mantil / and
adiugit torestore the mantil and til amend as law wil

In the court of the burgh of abirdene haldin be the ballies in the tolbuthe of the
samen the xxiiij dai of Aprile the yer' forsaid / Anent the paper of compt rek
ning and payment of four' barrellis of salmond deliuerit be Johne malisson
til Johne of Kyntor writin with his hand and present til ane assise todecide
tharuppon quhethir it was sufficent compt rekning and payment or nocht And
becaus' the said Johne malisson allegit in his paper that he warit the siluer
of twa barrellis of salmond to the said Johne of Kyntor in reid gaskoun'
wyne and awnterit it with him self eftir the command' and charge of the said John'
of Kyntor the quhilk he offerit him topreve . And the tudir twa barrellis
the said John' malisson allegit he couthe nocht sel for na siluer becaus' thai
war rottyn gude and na merchand gude the quhilk he offerit him topreve
and that he left thaim behind him in cornelis wifis hous' of camfeir' / the assis'
deferrit til his preif / and ordanit the ballies and court toassigne him ane
day tharto And tharuppon the court riply avisit ordanit and decretit that the
said Johne malisson salbring sufficent preif in the erast schippis
tobe ladyn with merchandis' passand furth' of the havyn of abirdene til flan
dris holand or seyland . and in the samen schippis cumand thare and again
til the port of abirdene or in ony vthir the erast schippis fra that tym cumand
til abirdene . apon the said matir eftir the tenour of his paper gevin to the
said Johne of Kyntor tharuppon

James lesly and Robert blindsel becom souerty for Androw telly that he in tyme
cuming sal commit na sic offens within this burgh' as it was fundin he had
done vndir the pain of xx crovnis tobe payt til saint nicholace wark

the xxvj dai of aprile In the tolbuthe before William blindsel and thom of chavmer
twa of the ballies . Alexander marr' referrit the preif anent the x s' debatabil betuix
him and patrik andirson ./ til the said patrikis aith . quhethir thai war offerit til him
be malcum lesly on his behalf or nocht before the tusday of the criing downe
of the money. And the said patrik declarit be his aith . that thai war nocht
offerit to him before that tusdai . And sa alexander marr' is ordanit toreleve
patrik andirson anent alexander chamer seriand of x s' within terme of law .

The xxviij dai of aprile the yer' of god et cetera lxxxvj In the court haldin be the ballies
in the tolbuthe the action persewit be Androw nachtie againis Johne steuart anent
xxxvj s' for the distruction of certane skynnis is referrit be the parties to the
decision' and determinacion of James lesly alexander reid and androw murra eldar richart hil tobe gevin
furth on tusday next tocum quhilkis persons ar sworn' to thesaid action and the parties oblist
thar handis vphaldin to vndirly thare ordinance

the ballies has assignit til Janet the spous' of Wilyeam rate tusday next
tocum peremptourly topreve sufficently that Johne Kervour quhom god assoilye was
pait for the warkmanschip of a towal buyrd of eestland buyrdis . And
that beand previt Androw ancroft sal deliuer til hir the said towal buyrd in
sa fer as he intromettit with it / And falyeand' of the said preif the said Ja
net sal pay to the said androw for the handlyne of it be the sicht of sworn
men and he sal deliuer it til hir

Johne steuart convict be assise in amerciament for strublance of marion' the spous'
of Duncan lundoris And the said marion' in amerciament for strublance of the
said John' steuartis wif and adiugit til amend til vthir as law wil

In the court haldin be the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe the secund day of
may the yer' forsaid Janet the spous' of William rate previt lagh'fully
with ser edward robertson chaplan and Jhone sincler' witnes sworn' that Jhon'
Kervour quham god assolye was pait for the warkmanschip of a towal
buyrd clamit be the said Janet fra Androw ancroft / quhar'for the said androw
was chargit be the ballies todeliuer til hir the said towal buyrd of eestland
buyrdis sa fer as he intromettit with it and like as he wil mak gude faith'
tharfor et cetera

the iij day of maij at the command' of our soueran lordis lettres the aldirman and ballies
with avis' of the counsale gert deliuer furth' of the common' kyst twa chartiris
of the landis in the newburgh' to Alexander liel procuratour for Agnes stokkar'
witnes heirof James lesly alexander reid ser John' striuelin notar and diuers' vthiris

The viij dai of maij Comperit before the ballies of abirdene in the court haldin
be thaim in the tolbuthe of the samen Margret cryne and constitute gilbert the
vaus and Johne fichet his gude son in law . hir procuratouris coniunctlie and
seueraly in al actionis concerning hir / and specialy anent the outequiting of a land
wedset be hir to Sym of gardin for xl s' promittand to hald ferm
and stabil et cetera

the samyn dai Sandris cowpar on the behalf of his wif has tayn topreve
sufficiently this dai xv dais peremptourly . that Duncan nory is content and pait
of samekil malt as scho bocht fra him / and falyeand tharof he is ordanit
tocontent Androw branche in the name of the said Duncan eftir the deliuerence of the
assise maid tharuppon of before

It is appoyntit and accordit before Johne stevynson ane of the ballies in Juge
ment betuix Johne Wormot on the ta part / and Dauid Kyntor on the tudir
part / that the said Dauid sal content and pay to the said Johne Wormot for his
quartar of the fisching of the port for this yere twa hambre barellis of
salmond ful reid and swete merchand gude at the fest of Sanct petir
callit lammes next tocum / And the said John' Wormot sal deliuer a merkis
worth of salt to the said Dauid or his factouris quhen it ples' him tores
saue it . To the quhilk payment lelely and treuly tobe maid as is before
expremyt the said Dauid Kintor is oblist be the faith of his body . the
said viij dai of maij the yer' et cetera lxxxvj

The xvij dai of maij the yer' forsaid In the court haldin be the ballies of
abirdene in the tolbuthe It was decretit be the court that Sandris cowpar in the
name of his wife sal content and pay til Androw branche on the behalf of
Duncan nory viij s' x d' for v firlotis of malt that scho resauit of the
laid of malt bocht fra the said Duncan . becaus' it was fundin na suffi
cent payment . that scho gef tharfor and tobe pait within terme of law / And scho
sal schaw the lave of the personaris that had the remanent of the malt for
the releving of hir

the counsale has ordanit toger warn Johne of Kyntor again monunday
next tocum peremptourly tosee Dauid marr' . allege again his paper that he has
deliuerit twiching the compt rekning and payment of ij barrelis of salmond and
xvj s' g' and forthir til ansuer' . at his instance eftir the tenour of the act maid
tharuppon of before

the samyn dai Alexander reid forspekar of the assise in the action determynit of be
fore betuix Johne fichet and androw culan has deliuerit in presence of the aldirman
ballies and consel . that it was ordanit be thaim that the said androw sal gif til Johne
fichet v firlotis of wad / demj merk of siluer and a hoggis heid

Item the said dai Johne of Knollis present to the Aldirman and counsale ane lettir maid
to him be the toune of the gift of the patronage of Sanct Johne the baptistis altar
toger be selit with the common' seil / quhilk lettre the aldirman tuke and deliuerit to
Thomas of fife / and he and the consel chargit him toseil the samen ./ And becaus' the
said patronage is grantit til John' of Knollis and his ayris mail for augmen
tacion of the said altar in condigne feftment of fyve merkis yerlie / the aldirman and
counsale has assignit til him til infeft the samen as said is within yer' and
day ./ And tharto he has consentit et cetera

xviijo die maij anno Domini et cetera lxxxvj quidam Willelmus andirson conuictus fuit per assisam
pro foristallacione lane et pellium ac regratacione denariatorum
Curia tenta per balliuos de abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xxijdo die maij anno predicto

quo die comparens in Judicio Willelmus mawyn et Jacobus martyn commorantes in Dysart
fatebantur se plenarie persolutos per Johannem vaus et Andream symson de octo
celdris salis albi per eos emptis et receptis ab eisdem ipsos inde quiteclamando imperpetuum

Inquisicio Alexander chamer filius alexander marr' gilbertus vaus David menyes senior thomas de
marr' Johannes vaus gilbertus mvrison patricius andree andreas symson gilbertus riburn et
Johannes lammynton' burgenses de abirdene Quj Jurati dicunt quod quondam Alexander forbes
Auus alexandri forbes latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo et cetera de
quadam terra Jacente subtus montem castri burgi de abirdene inter terram Dauid
mathei ex occidentali parte / et viam regiam qua itur ad li futy ex orientali et boreali
partibus / et torrentem Sancte trinitatis ex australi parte et quod dictus Alexander est legitimus
et propinquior heres et cetera et legitime etatis Et quod dicta terra cum pertinenciis valet nunc per annum x s'
et valuit tempore pacis xx s' Et quod tenetur in capite de domino nostro Rege per seruicium
burgale Et quod nunc existit in manibus eiusdem domini regis legitime per se ipsum causa mortis
et a tempore obitus quondam Cristiane ogilvy sponse dicti quondam Alexandri forbes quo fuit
in coniuncta infeodacione dicte terre / per spacium iiijor mensium aut eocirca In defectu veri heredis
Jus suum minime prosequentis

the samen dai becaus' John' of Kintor was nocht warnit to this dai at the
instance of Dauid marr' the ballies has chargit the seriandis in plain court
to warn him to comper' before thaim on Wednisdai next tocum as dai
peremptour til answer' at the instance of the said Dauid eftir the tenor of the
act precedent

Curia legalis tenta per balliuos de Abirdene in pretorio eiusdem xixo
die mensis maij anno Domini et cetera lxxxvjto quo die curia affirmata

Eodem die Johannes stevinson tercio die vocatus ad sectam Johannis vaus
non comparuit responsurus . quare philippus Dunbrek seriendus de mandato Judicis
distringebat dictum Johannem stevinson et premuniat eundem ad proximam curiam
legalem tanquam quartum et peremptorium diem huius processus

the assise fyndis Alexander hay dettour til Dauid menyeis eldar of a pety quartar
of salt fraght extendand to xiiij s' viij d'

The aldirman has tane to preve this dai xv dais that the wattir malis x merkis of the quhilkis
Johne of culan allegis he has quittance of the ballies being for the tym was
assignit to him be the counsale of this toun' to rais' before the date of the said
quittance / and that the ballies war dischargit tharof / And he becom dettour to the
Erle marscheal tharfor be ordinance of the said consale To the quhilk dai
John' of culan is warnit to comper' and here the said preif bringand with him
the forsaid acquittance

The samen dai the assise has deliuerit be John' more forspekar that thai couthe
nocht end the matir betuix Dauid marr' and Johne of Kintor twiching the compt
rekning and payment that the said Johne of Kintor was ordanit tomak to the said
Dauid of ij barrelis of salmond and xvj s' g' / and the paper deliuerit be the said John'
tharuppon / quhil the said Johne of Kyntor bring the bil of charge that
Dauid marr' gef him togiddir with the rekning eftir the tenor of the act maid tharup
pon of before . And the aldirman and balyeis with avis' of the court has assig
nit to Johne of Kyntor tobring the forsaid bil of charge in the erast schip
saylland fra the port of abirdene cumand in flandris holand or seyland and
agane to Abirdene And falyeand of the production of the bil of charge
as forsaid is / the tenour and effect tharof is referrit to Dauid marris awn'
declaracion and aith tomak sic like And that beand done Johne of
Kintor sal mak him rekning and payment of the said ij barrelis of salmond and xvj s' g'
eftir the forme of the said bil and charge committit to him tharuppon

Item the said dai Alexander chamer of murchil forspekar to Elene crab comperit with hir
in the court sayand that Alexander rolland wrangwisly occupiis certane land of the
said elenis liand in the castelgate on the southe part of the samen betuix the
land of William goldsmyth on the eist part and the land of vmquhile maistir
Thomas the vaus on the west part / The quhilk Alexander rolland be his forspekar
Dauid menyes yungar grantit the occupacion of the land pertening to the saide
Elene crab / and denyit the wrang . And sa the said action was put to the
decision' and determinacion of ane assise of thir persons vndirwritin that is tosay
Alexander menyes James lesly Robert blindsel John' of culan Johne colison
alexander reid John' of Knollis alexander of marr' Johne Wormot gilbert the
vaus androw branche Thomas of marr' Walter achneve and Robert prat
The quhilk assise the gret aith sworn Riply avisit has fundin and deliuer
it be James lesly forspekar / that the said Alexander rolland . has nocht occupiit wrang
wisly the land clamit be the forsaid elene . And has ordanit that Alexander
rolland sal remayn with the samyn land vnto the tyme he be content
of the costis maid apon it / eftir the tenour of the indentur' maid betuix thaim
tharuppon

The assise has fundin that Androw murref masown is convict for the strublance
of thom of barry Johne of Kyndrumy and matho Wrycht And the said thom
is convict for strublance of the said androw And the assise has ordanit that
gif in tym cuming ony of the said masowns or ony vthiris in the luge beis fundin
analiand or analyis and puttis away ony stuf pertening to Saint nicolace
wark / that for ilke pennyworth' previt analyit be thaim or throu thaim /
thare salbe takin xij d' of thare feis tobe disponit apon the bijng of siclike
stuf Als' that nane of thaim in tym cuming sal beyr wauppynis within the luge
bot a knyfe toscheir thare met vndir pain of x s' And gif ony of
thaim happynis in ony strublance or offens againis vthir in tym cuming in word
or deid throu the quhilk the wark beis scathit / the faute beand pre
vit the fautar' sal pay fyve merkis to Sanct Nicolace werk / and that
tobe tane wp of the rediast of his fee / and him self toremofe the
wark for yer' and dai Attour the said assis' with avis' of the Aldirman
and consel has ordanit with consent of the masowns / that na masown of the
luge salbe lent be the maistiris of the wark nor pas of thare awn'
auctorite towyrk withoute the luge with ony may withoute a seand caus'
that it stand apon the perel of a manis hous' / and that salbe bot for twa
houris vndir the pain forsaid of v merkis tobe rasit vnforgevyn

In the court haldin be the Aldirman and ballies in the tolbuthe the last day of
maij the yer' et cetera lxxxvj It was fundin and deliuerit be ane assise that
William of garriach yungar had foristallit the said burgh before that he was
maid burges and freeman tharof in wol hide and skyn and in regratyn' of
pennyworthis And the said William was maid quyte of al sic foristalling
and regratyn sen the tym he was resauit in the fraternite of the gild and maid
burges as said is throu his awn' purgacion maid at the ordinance of the assis'

the samyn dai maistir Johne gray Androw murray androw masown and Johne of
myl masowns chosin and sworn to consider and pryse the costis maid be alexander
rolland apon the land clamit be Elene crab / has deliuerit in presence of the aldir
man and ballies in Jugement that the cost drawis to xij s' and tharof thai haf
strikin of vj s' thai fynd the hous' is scathit samekil / and sa is scho topay
vj s' And thai haf ordanit that the said alexander sal purge him be his aith that
he had na stayn' nor vthir stuf belanging that land that mycht scaith' the
grund

The first dai of Junij the yer of god et cetera lxxxvj before the Aldirman and ballies in
Jugement Comperit Alexander reid and grantit him tobe cumin ful dettour . til ane
nobil man Alexander Irvin of the Drum for fyve pundis of vsual money of Scot
land anent William portar tobe pait at martymes next tocum but langar delay
And the said William is oblist be his hand and gude to releve alexander reid
of the payment of the said some' of v li'

And It is toremembre that the xxvij dai of the moneth of maij the yer' for
said . In presence of William blindsel ane of the ballies of abirdene Alexander Irvin
of the Drum grantit him fullely content and pait be William portar of the sowme
of twenty pundis . for the outequiting of a land liand in the gaistraw the
quhilk land was vmquhile murtho glastreis / and laid in wed til thesaid
Alexander be quhilum mage glastre for twenty pundis . the quhilk some' William
portar was constrenyeit be the law be virtu of his condicion topay to the lard
of Drum And the said lard of Drum before the balye forsaid has surro
gate William portar in his richt of the said land to demayn the samyn and
dispone tharuppon . as he mycht do

The thrid dai of Junij the yer' forsaid In the court haldin be the Aldirman and ballies
of the burgh of abirdene in the tolbuthe of the samen / William of garuiach yungar ac
cusit of strublance and rebellion' againis the officeris and communite of the said burgh .
in the purchessing of lordschip in the contrar' of thaim and thare fred' / denyit / and
was convict of the said challance be ane assise of the best and worthiast of the
said burgh present for the tyme

Item William of garuiach eldar accusit for art and part of the said strublance and re
bellioun / denyit / and was maid quyte tharof be the samyn assise

The samyn dai thomas prat becom souerty to the Aldirman balyeis and to the
toune for William garriach yungar to entyr him to thaim apon xx dais war
ning / And als' for the payment of his vnlawis in the quhilkis he is convict
And the said thomas is now warnit in the court to entir him as said is
this dai xxtj dais And gif the Erle marschel at the terme of the xx dais
sendis laghful excusacion that the aldirman and consel beis plesit of / and desiris
vthir xxtj dais to entir the said William as foresaid is . the said Thomas prat
standis souerty in like wis' for his entre than as before

The counsale and communite inquirit be the aldirman and ballies anent the payment of lord
Erskynnis pensioun sayd thai couthe nocht mak payment tharof quhil the
chekkar' And gif the Erle marscheal procuratour to the said lord wald ger
poynd tharfor before the said tym of the chekkar . thai haf concludit with ane
assent / that thai wil tak thar' poyndis again with the perel of law et cetera

In the balye court haldin the v dai of Junij the yer' et cetera lxxxvj Johne reid
pardonar was convict be assis' in amerciament for strublance of blak Jhonis wif
and to amend as law wil

The vj dai of Junij Comperit before the Aldirman ballies and diuers' of the
counsail in the tolbuthe /. Wilyeam scherar' son and ayr of vmquhile Androw
scherar' burges of Abirdene with his forspekaris maistir Duncan scherar'
parson of clat and Robert blindsel / And askit the said child tobe kend til
his ayrschip as a burges ayr The quhilkis aldirman ballies and
consale riply avisit ./ decretit and ordanit the said child tobe kend til
his ayrschip . and his airschip tobe deliuerit til him And fand him of lach
ful age toresave the samen and to gif quittance tharof

The vij dai of June Robert blindsel Johne son Alexander reid Johne of
culan gilbert the vaus and Androw murray eldar war chosin be the consel
auditouris apon Thom prattis compt of the bekynnis and
